member.name: T:me.andburn.DDSReader.DDSImage
member.summary:
The brand-spankingly new and revamped DDSReader library.
Now with 100% native .NET goodness.
This loads a DDS image into an object. Not much more than that. At the moment, it only supports DXT1 compressed images. It doesn't support uncompressed images yet.

member.name: F:me.andburn.DDSReader.DDSImage.SUPPORTED_ENCODERS
member.summary: A space-seperated list of supported image encoders.

member.name: M:me.andburn.DDSReader.DDSImage.#ctor(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Constructs a new DDSImage object using the given byte array, which contains the raw DDS file.
member.param: A byte[] containing the DDS file.

member.name: P:me.andburn.DDSReader.DDSImage.BitmapImage
member.summary: Returns a System.Imaging.Bitmap containing the DDS image.

member.name: T:me.andburn.DDSReader.DDSReader
member.summary: This is the main class of the library. All static methods are contained within.

member.name: M:me.andburn.DDSReader.DDSReader.LoadImage(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Loads a DDS image file, and returns a Bitmap object of the image.
member.returns: The Bitmap representation of the image.

member.name: M:me.andburn.DDSReader.DDSReader.Ping
member.summary: "Pings" the library.

member.name: T:me.andburn.DDSReader.UnknownFileFormatException
member.summary: Thrown when there is an unknown compressor used in the DDS file.

member.name: T:me.andburn.DDSReader.InvalidFileHeaderException
member.summary: Thrown when an invalid file header has been encountered.

member.name: T:me.andburn.DDSReader.NotADDSImageException
member.summary: Thrown when the data does not contain a DDS image.

member.name: T:me.andburn.DDSReader.PixelFormat
member.summary: Various pixel formats/compressors used by the DDS image.

member.name: F:me.andburn.DDSReader.PixelFormat.ARGB
member.summary: 32-bit image, with 8-bit red, green, blue and alpha.

member.name: F:me.andburn.DDSReader.PixelFormat.RGB
member.summary: 24-bit image with 8-bit red, green, blue.

member.name: F:me.andburn.DDSReader.PixelFormat.DXT1
member.summary: 16-bit DXT-1 compression, 1-bit alpha.

member.summary: DXT-2 Compression

member.name: F:me.andburn.DDSReader.PixelFormat.DXT3
member.summary: DXT-3 Compression

member.name: F:me.andburn.DDSReader.PixelFormat.DXT4
member.summary: DXT-4 Compression

member.name: F:me.andburn.DDSReader.PixelFormat.DTX5
member.summary: DXT-5 Compression

member.name: F:me.andburn.DDSReader.PixelFormat.THREEDC
member.summary: 3DC Compression

member.name: F:me.andburn.DDSReader.PixelFormat.ATI1N
member.summary: ATI1n Compression

member.name: F:me.andburn.DDSReader.PixelFormat.UNKNOWN
member.summary: Unknown pixel format.
